#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

int main()
{
 long long int nT;
 long long int  r,x,y,x0,y0,v;
 double res;
 scanf("%lld",&nT);
 while(nT--)
 {
  scanf("%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld%lld",&r,&x,&y,&x0,&y0,&v);
  res = r-sqrt((x-x0)*(x-x0)+(y-y0)*(y-y0));
  if(res>0)
    printf("%.6f\n",(res/v));
  else
    printf("0.000000\n");
 }
 return 0;
}
